feed.title: Ruminations on Code
feed.subtitle: A blog about code and software development - high level dynamic languages like PowerShell, and low level languages too.

entry.title: 2017 | New-Blog
entry.content:
Blogging is still apparently a thing.

I’ve learned so much from blogs over the years, I figured it was time I started my own.

I’ll write about stuff I find interesting, it won’t always be useful.

Feel free to suggest topics.
entry.summary: Blogging is still apparently a thing.
